props.name: theme
props.description: Specify theme properties to override specific styles for calendar parts

props.name: style
props.description: Specify style for calendar container element

props.name: onDateChanged
props.description: Handler which gets executed when the date changes

props.name: onMonthChange
props.description: Handler which gets executed when the month changes

props.name: showTodayButton
props.description: Whether to show the today button

props.name: disabledOpacity
props.description: The opacity for the disabled today button (0-1)

props.name: numberOfDays
props.description: The number of days to present in the timeline calendar (1-7)

props.name: timelineLeftInset
props.description: The left inset of the timeline calendar (sidebar width)
